memories.title: Ivan's preferences
memories.content: Ivan values practical solutions over complex setups. He wants results over process. Communication style: direct, practical, skip the fluff. Timezone: Africa/Kampala (GMT+3).

memories.title: MoonlightAI Squad setup
memories.content: Created agent squad: Jarvis (coordination), Fury (research), Loki (content), Vision (SEO), Quill (social). Using Mission Control dashboard with local JSON storage.

memories.title: LinkedIn credentials saved
memories.content: Client ID: your_linkedin_client_id, Client Secret: your_linkedin_client_secret. Company page: https://www.linkedin.com/company/110355782/admin/dashboard/.

memories.title: Cron jobs reduced to daily
memories.content: All 5 MarvelSquad heartbeat jobs changed from every 15 min to once daily due to API rate limits. Jarvis 8am, Fury 9am, Loki 10am, Vision 11am, Quill 12pm.

memories.title: Mission Control built
memories.content: Built 5-component dashboard: Tasks Board, Content Pipeline (YouTube & Blog), Calendar, Memory, Team. Next.js with local JSON data. All connected to real OpenClaw data.

memories.title: API issues - MiniMax & Ollama
memories.content: MiniMax API key is invalid (401 error). Ollama is rate limited. All agent heartbeats failing. Need to fix API credentials.

memories.title: PostBridge for social posting
memories.content: Found PostBridge ($14/mo) as alternative for multi-platform posting. No freemium. Connects X, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, etc.

memories.title: LinkedIn access token received
memories.content: Ivan provided LinkedIn access token. Trying to use LinkedIn API directly before PostBridge. Testing if token is valid.
